text: hm.. code_warntype doesn't print to IO?

elements.text: hm.. code_warntype doesn't print to IO?

text:
unfortunately no…

```julia> a = @code_warntype sin(π)
Variables
  #self#::Core.Const(sin)
  x::Core.Const(π)
  xf::Float64

Body::Float64
1 ─      (xf = Base.Math.float(x))
│   %2 = (x === xft::Core.Const(3.141592653589793))::Core.Const(false)
└──      goto #3 if not %2
2 ─      Core.Const(:(Core.tuple(x)))
│        Core.Const(:(Base.Math.MethodError(Base.Math.sin, %4)))
│        Core.Const(:(Base.Math.throw(%5)))
└──      Core.Const(:(goto %8))
3 ┄ %8 = Base.Math.sin(xf::Core.Const(3.141592653589793))::Float64
└──      yreturn %8

julia> typeof(a)
Nothing```

│   %2 = (x === xft::Core.Const(3.141592653589793))::Core.Const(false)

3 ┄ %8 = Base.Math.sin(xf::Core.Const(3.141592653589793))::Float64
└──      yreturn %8

julia> typeof(a)
